Title: Requires homeowners insurance policies to include coverage of residential solar power systems
Summary: Requires homeowners insurance policies to include coverage of residential solar power systems; requires insurers to notify policyholders of such available coverage; permits insurers to impose a reasonable premium or increased rate for coverage of residential solar power systems.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring homeowners insurance policies to include coverage of residential solar power systems
